personalInfo.name: Anudeep Sri Bathina
personalInfo.title: Lead Data Scientist | AI Architect
personalInfo.summary: Lead Data Scientist with 9+ years of experience building scalable AI systems, LLM/RAG solutions, and production-grade data platforms. Invited speaker at Berlin School of Business and Innovation (BSBI) Café Scientifique (AI in Business, Jun 4, 2021) and guest speaker for academic/industry programs including an STTP on Machine Learning Fundamentals (Dec 3, 2024). Author/contributor to CRC Press / Taylor & Francis publications and active mentor via ADPList and Topmate.

experience.description: Architecting enterprise GenAI solutions and LLM systems. Leading development of Python-based parsers and automated interpretation models. Overseeing API deployments using FastAPI and optimizing retrieval systems with Azure Vector Search and Cosmos DB.
Directed ML engineering teams to build data pipelines and predictive models. Recognized for high-impact delivery and technical leadership in scaling data products.
Engineered scalable PySpark pipelines resulting in measurable performance improvements. Developed client-focused interfaces and optimized database queries for complex datasets.
Led cloud data migration projects and implemented predictive analytics models; specialized in automated data migration and visualization of key business insights.

education.description: Graduate research in computer vision (YOLOv8 and ResNet-50). Focus on advanced algorithms and applied AI.
Foundation in Computer Science and Engineering; active involvement in robotics projects and technical societies.

publications.title: Transfer Learning for Groundfish Recognition (Thesis)
publications.description: Developed a cross-database recognition system using YOLOv8 and ResNet50, achieving 94.10% mAP.Addressed data scarcity in underwater environments for sustainable fisheries management.

publications.title: Blueprint of IoT for Smart Cities
publications.description: Co-authored a handbook chapter on IoT blueprinting and management/system challenges for smart city development in emerging markets.

talks.title: AI in Business (Café Scientifique 5.0)
talks.event: Berlin School of Business and Innovation (BSBI)
talks.description: Invited speaker/panellist for BSBI’s Café Scientifique session.

talks.title: Classification Models in ML
talks.description: Hands-on session as part of an STTP program on Machine Learning Fundamentals.

talks.title: Rec Systems for E-Commerce
talks.description: Invited webinar session listed in PVPSIT institutional documentation.

projects.name: Annapurna-AI
projects.description: AI-powered meal planner for South Indian vegetarian cuisine with cultural food constraints and evidence-backed nutrition recommendations.

projects.name: ClinIQ
projects.description: Enterprise Healthcare RAG with LangGraph agentic workflow, semantic chunking, and strict citation generation for policy documents.

projects.name: Media Organizer
projects.description: Cross-platform mobile media organization tool with iOS/Android support, date-based sorting, and real-time web dashboard.
